name: Yahoo! Answers: Dark Amethyst
description: [By: Leon Williams] This is a dark purple theme for Yahoo! Answers. This is also my first submitted Stylish theme. If you have comments, questions, or concerns regarding this theme, feel free to contact me or leave a post below.
